revisionDesc.change: Vote - AcceptText - lin1 dispense with the alt readings, lin4 dispense with alt readings lin10 ἀμ{ε}ίμητον => <:ἀμίμητον|reg|ἀμείμητον:> lin11 dispense with alt reading, lin14 dispense with alt reading, lin2bis dispense with alt reading, lin7bis see Sosin's solution, lin8 use subst for διὸ, lin7 ἀμ{ε}ίμητον => <:ἀμίμητον|reg|ἀμείμητον:>, lin12 dispense with alt reading

Vote - AcceptText - Accept. LinR3 use proper dbl sq brackets; I don't much like the heavy use of alt tags for so many possible readings, especially where a single letter is concerned (see esp. linR4, where το.1 would probably be better); LinR10 use proper dbl sq brackets; linR14-15 <:[.3]15.- τησι|alt:|[ταυ]15.- τησὶ:>; linV1bis--> vestig (i.e. not superscript); linV2bis--> [.?]α̣υ̣τ̣ω̣ν̣; linV3 use proper dbl sq brackets; linV4--> .4τ̣α̣ι.2; linV7bis I'd much prefer [.?].1ι̣ φήμης ; linV8 use proper dbl sq brackets; linV12--> ἀγένητον; linV13 use proper dbl sq brackets
Add dummy header for original identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/p.ammon;1;24' pointing to new identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/p.ammon;2;46'
entered text of P.Ammon II 46 (olim P.Ammon I 24) from digital copy, proofread against print edition. Problems in double angle brackets (interlinear text) at lin.12bis (displayed in preview).
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
